summary: The foundational declaration of the Model Context Protocol (MCP), signed for agent and human trust.

trust.warning: Only some blocks are signed  and only these are certified by a Model Context Protocol-compliant authority.

badges.label: MCP — Ready
badges.description: Declares that the site participates in the MCP protocol. Status: Declared but not verified or signed.

badges.label: MCP — Signed
badges.description: Declares that the site participates in the MCP protocol. Status: The file is cryptographically signed.

badges.label: MCP — Verified
badges.description: Declares that the site participates in the MCP protocol. Status: The feed has passed automatic verification.

badges.label: MCP — Certified
badges.description: Declares that the site participates in the MCP protocol. Status: Audited and approved by a certifying authority.

badges.label: LLMFeed — Ready
badges.description: Indicates that a `.llmfeed.json` is present and available. Status: Declared but not verified or signed.

badges.label: LLMFeed — Signed
badges.description: Indicates that a `.llmfeed.json` is present and available. Status: The file is cryptographically signed.

badges.label: LLMFeed — Verified
badges.description: Indicates that a `.llmfeed.json` is present and available. Status: The feed has passed automatic verification.

badges.label: LLMFeed — Certified
badges.description: Indicates that a `.llmfeed.json` is present and available. Status: Audited and approved by a certifying authority.

badges.label: Export — Ready
badges.description: The site supports exporting content to LLMs. Status: Declared but not verified or signed.

badges.label: Export — Signed
badges.description: The site supports exporting content to LLMs. Status: The file is cryptographically signed.

badges.label: Export — Verified
badges.description: The site supports exporting content to LLMs. Status: The feed has passed automatic verification.

badges.label: Export — Certified
badges.description: The site supports exporting content to LLMs. Status: Audited and approved by a certifying authority.

badges.label: Prompt — Ready
badges.description: Supports prompt replay with structured sessions. Status: Declared but not verified or signed.

badges.label: Prompt — Signed
badges.description: Supports prompt replay with structured sessions. Status: The file is cryptographically signed.

badges.label: Prompt — Verified
badges.description: Supports prompt replay with structured sessions. Status: The feed has passed automatic verification.

badges.label: Prompt — Certified
badges.description: Supports prompt replay with structured sessions. Status: Audited and approved by a certifying authority.

badges.label: Feed — Ready
badges.description: The feed has been indexed for LLM compatibility. Status: Declared but not verified or signed.

badges.label: Feed — Signed
badges.description: The feed has been indexed for LLM compatibility. Status: The file is cryptographically signed.

badges.label: Feed — Verified
badges.description: The feed has been indexed for LLM compatibility. Status: The feed has passed automatic verification.

badges.label: Feed — Certified
badges.description: The feed has been indexed for LLM compatibility. Status: Audited and approved by a certifying authority.

badges.label: Agent — Ready
badges.description: The site is compatible with autonomous LLM agents. Status: Declared but not verified or signed.

badges.label: Agent — Signed
badges.description: The site is compatible with autonomous LLM agents. Status: The file is cryptographically signed.

badges.label: Agent — Verified
badges.description: The site is compatible with autonomous LLM agents. Status: The feed has passed automatic verification.

badges.label: Agent — Certified
badges.description: The site is compatible with autonomous LLM agents. Status: Audited and approved by a certifying authority.

badges.label: Capabilities — Ready
badges.description: Declares functional endpoints and agent-facing actions. Status: Declared but not verified or signed.

badges.label: Capabilities — Signed
badges.description: Declares functional endpoints and agent-facing actions. Status: The file is cryptographically signed.

badges.label: Capabilities — Verified
badges.description: Declares functional endpoints and agent-facing actions. Status: The feed has passed automatic verification.

badges.label: Capabilities — Certified
badges.description: Declares functional endpoints and agent-facing actions. Status: Audited and approved by a certifying authority.
